Title: Relates to randomized in-game purchases in video games
Summary: Requires chances of randomized in-game purchases in video games to be disclosed; requires labeling of video games with randomized in-game purchases; restricts purchasing of video games with randomized in-game purchases to those eighteen years old or older.
LawCode: Add ยง396-kk-1, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to randomized in-game purchases in video games
